title: Student-Centered Online Education Based on Multimedia for Advanced Computer Graphics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational concepts of graphic design
context.additional_context: Education for learners in managerial/leadership roles to strengthen competencies in social sector job functions.

learning_goals: Learners can produce graphic assets required in practical settings with 80% accuracy using 3D modeling tools.
Learners can collaborate with peers in a multimedia-based learning environment to complete complex graphic projects
Learners achieve over 90% problem-solving proficiency by applying computer graphics theory to real-world work scenarios

resources: Cloud-based Graphic Design Tool (e.g., Adobe Creative Cloud)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
